H0.text: Minimizing illness from disease is the demand for which some machines have been designed to perform complicated tasks.

H1.text: Minimizing the need for manual labor is the demand that has led some machines to be designed to perform complicated tasks.

H2.text: Maximizing the price of consumer goods is the demand that has led some machines to be designed to perform complicated tasks.

H3.text: Maximizing the use of nonâ€‘renewable resources is a demand that has led to the design of some machines to perform complicated tasks.

A4.text: Disinfection robot: It has the capability to disinfect a whole room in mere minutes, generally using pulsed ultraviolet light. They are being used to fight Ebola virus disease.

A5.text: Hospital robots - With a pre-programmed layout of their environment and built-in sensors, hospital robots deliver medications, meals and specimens around hospitals.
